zh_CN.GeoInfo: 根据geoip api提供的信息，当前IP可能在中国
zh_CN.PromptMirror: 是否选用中国镜像完成安装? [Y/n] (自定义镜像输入 3)：
zh_CN.PromptCustomImage: 请输入自定义镜像 (例如:dn-dao-github-mirror.daocloud.io),留空为不使用：

zh_CN.DockerImageNotFound: 未找到带有 nezha-dashboard 仓库的 Docker 镜像。
zh_CN.SelectInstallMethod: 请自行选择您的安装方式（如果你是安装Agent，输入哪个都是一样的）：
zh_CN.InstallDashboardInfo: 您可能已经安装过面板端，重复安装会覆盖数据，请注意备份。
zh_CN.ErrorDownloadAgent: Release 下载失败，请检查本机能否连接
zh_CN.SuccessModifyConfig: %[1]s 配置 修改成功，请稍等 %[1]s 重启生效
zh_CN.ModifyAgentConfInfo: 请先在管理面板上添加Agent，记录下密钥
zh_CN.PromptModifyAgent_1: 请输入一个解析到面板所在IP的域名（不可套CDN）:
zh_CN.PromptModifyAgent_2: 请输入面板RPC端口 (默认值 5555):
zh_CN.PromptModifyAgent_4: 是否启用针对 gRPC 端口的 SSL/TLS加密 (--tls)，需要请按 [y]，默认是不需要，不理解用户可回车跳过:
zh_CN.DownloadDockerScript: 正在下载 Docker 脚本
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_1: 关于 GitHub Oauth2 应用：在 https://github.com/settings/developers 创建，无需审核，Callback 填 http(s)://域名或IP/oauth2/callback
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_2: 关于 Gitee Oauth2 应用：在 https://gitee.com/oauth/applications 创建，无需审核，Callback 填 http(s)://域名或IP/oauth2/callback
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_3: 请输入 OAuth2 提供商(github/gitlab/jihulab/gitee，默认 github):
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_4: 请输入 Oauth2 应用的 Client ID:
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_5: 请输入 Oauth2 应用的 Client Secret:
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_6: 请输入 GitHub/Gitee 登录名作为管理员，多个以逗号隔开:
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_8: 请输入站点访问端口: (默认 8008)
zh_CN.PromptModifyDashboard_9: 请输入用于 Agent 接入的 RPC 端口: (默认 5555)

zh_CN.DashboardInfo: 默认管理面板地址：域名:站点访问端口
zh_CN.ErrorRestartDashboard: 重启失败，可能是因为启动时间超过了两秒，请稍后查看日志信息
zh_CN.ErrorFailedToStart: 启动失败，请稍后查看日志信息
zh_CN.ErrorFailedToStop: 停止失败，请稍后查看日志信息

en_US.PromptMirror: Will the installation be done with a Chinese Mirror? [Y/n] (Custom Mirror Input 3):
en_US.PromptCustomImage: Please enter a custom image (e.g. :dn-dao-github-mirror.daocloud.io). If left blank, it won't be used:

en_US.ErrorDownloadAgent: Fail to download agent, please check if the network can link
en_US.SuccessModifyConfig: %[1]s configuration modified successfully, please wait for %[1]s self-restart to take effect
en_US.ModifyAgentConfInfo: Please add Agent in the Dashboard first, record the secret
en_US.PromptModifyAgent_1: Please enter a domain that resolves to the IP where Dashboard is located (no CDN):
en_US.PromptModifyAgent_4: Do you want to enable SSL/TLS encryption for the gRPC port (--tls)? Press [y] if yes, the default is not required, and users can press Enter to skip if you don't understand:
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_1: About the GitHub Oauth2 application: create it at https://github.com/settings/developers, no review required, and fill in the http(s)://domain_or_IP/oauth2/callback
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_2: (Not recommended) About the Gitee Oauth2 application: create it at https://gitee.com/oauth/applications, no auditing required, and fill in the http(s)://domain_or_IP/oauth2/callback
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_3: Please enter the OAuth2 provider (github/gitlab/jihulab/gitee, default github):
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_4: Please enter the Client ID of the Oauth2 application:
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_5: Please enter the Client Secret of the Oauth2 application:
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_6: Please enter your GitHub/Gitee login name as the administrator, separated by commas:
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_8: Please enter the site access port: (default 8008)
en_US.PromptModifyDashboard_9: Please enter the RPC port to be used for Agent access: (default 5555)
en_US.ErrorRestartDashboard: The restart failed, probably because the boot time exceeded two seconds, please check the log information later
en_US.ErrorFailedToStart: Failed to start, please check the log message later
en_US.ErrorFailedToStop: Failed to stop, please check the log message later
